origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'SocialSecurityAPI.get_medical_reimbursement', 'description': 'This function provides information on medical insurance reimbursement based on the insurance type, location of medical service, and beneficiary age.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'insuranceType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of medical insurance, e.g., basic, supplementary.'}, {'name': 'location', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The location where medical services were received, e.g., in-province, out-of-province.'}, {'name': 'beneficiaryAge', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The age of the beneficiary.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'reimbursementDetails', 'description': 'The details of medical insurance reimbursement including coverage limits, procedures, and required documents.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 SocialSecurityAPI.get_medical_reimbursement, 它的参数输入如下: 'insuranceType'是'medical', 'location'是'out-of-province', 'beneficiaryAge'是'23'.
